page.title: 11Housing in Linwood.
page.content: We went to the{Clippens shops}to do a survey on housing in{Linwood}.We did this to find out what people thought of the houses in Linwood.The houses in the{North Clippens}area of Linwood were built about{20 years ago}and are owned by the local council. Of the 12 people asked 4 lived in flats ,3 lived in terraces,4 lived in semi_detached and 1 lived in a detached house.4 people have lived here less than 10 years,4 between 10 and 20 years and 4 for more than 20 years. Most people were satisfied with their accomodation.This was because the houses are in good condition,have enough room and are in a nice area. Those people who were not satisfied said that the houses were old and damp.
